subject: Help with JMock
msgSnippet: After being advised in an earlier thread I exchanged my mockobjectdoclet generated mocks with mock objects from the JMock library. No problem, everything
messageBody:
After being advised in an earlier thread I exchanged my
mockobjectdoclet generated mocks with mock objects from the JMock
library. No problem, everything worked fine for a while. Now I have
the need to mock a class instead of an interface. So I followed what
it said on the JMock web site and changed the package hierarchy from
org.jmock.* to org.jmock.cglib.*. (I didn't use wildcard imports.) I
recompiled and re-ran my test and I'm getting:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Exception in constructor:
testNextDataModelMocked (java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
net/sf/cglib/proxy/MethodInterceptor

I know these kinds of errors in that they're related to Classloader
mixups. Can anyone here help me on this?

Cliff
